decks.notes: This deck focuses on quickly generating and utilizing energy resources to fuel the Aetherworks Marvel card in order to cheat out powerful Eldrazi creatures like Ulamog, the Ceaseless Hunger. The deck includes efficient energy-generating cards, card draw, removal spells, and counterspells to protect the combo pieces. The goal is to ramp up energy production, play Aetherworks Marvel, and use it to put powerful creatures onto the battlefield ahead of schedule, overwhelming the opponent with massive threats.

This deck focuses on utilizing a diverse range of powerful creatures and removal spells to control the game and outvalue opponents. By combining aggressive threats like Heart of Kiran and Glorybringer with resilient options such as Greenbelt Rampager and Hazoret the Fervent, it aims to maintain board presence and pressure while disrupting the opponent's game plan with Unlicensed Disintegration and Fatal Push. The versatile mix of creatures and spells provides flexibility against different strategies, allowing the deck to adapt and dominate in a variety of matchups.

The main focus of this deck is to control the pace of the game by using counter spells and removal spells to disrupt the opponent's strategy. It aims to stabilize the board with cards like Sweltering Suns and Torrential Gearhulk while drawing cards and generating energy with spells like Glimmer of Genius and Harnessed Lightning. The deck also includes cards like Disallow and Negate to counter key spells played by the opponent. Overall, the deck aims to maintain control of the game until it can secure a win condition through card advantage and powerful threats like Torrential Gearhulk.

The main focus of this deck is to control the board through counterspells, removal spells, and card draw while using powerful finishers like Torrential Gearhulk. The deck aims to efficiently answer threats and disrupt the opponent's game plan until it can establish a dominant position on the battlefield. By carefully managing resources and making strategic decisions, the deck seeks to outvalue and outlast opponents, ultimately securing victory through a combination of card advantage and powerful spells.

The main concept of this deck revolves around utilizing Aetherworks Marvel to quickly ramp up energy and cheat powerful creatures like Ulamog onto the battlefield. The deck also includes cards like Whirler Virtuoso and Rogue Refiner to generate energy and provide additional value. The presence of counterspells like Negate and Censor help protect the combo pieces, while cards like Chandra, Flamecaller and Sweltering Suns provide board control. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with powerful creatures and high energy efficiency while controlling the board.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly assemble the energy resources needed to activate Aetherworks Marvel and cheat out powerful Eldrazi creatures like Ulamog, the Ceaseless Hunger. The deck includes a combination of energy-generating cards, efficient removal spells, and value creatures to help generate energy and provide additional utility. By using Aetherworks Marvel to bypass traditional mana costs and drop huge threats onto the battlefield early, the deck aims to overwhelm opponents and close out the game before they can respond.

The main concept of the deck is to utilize energy-generating cards like Aetherworks Marvel and Woodweaver's Puzzleknot to power out big threats like Ulamog, the Ceaseless Hunger and Chandra, Flamecaller. Whirler Virtuoso and Servant of the Conduit help ramp up energy production, while Harnessed Lightning provides removal. The deck aims to quickly assemble its combo pieces and overwhelm the opponent with powerful threats and a steady stream of energy. The mana base is designed to support the deck's energy requirements while also providing consistency in casting its spells.

This deck is focused on quickly overwhelming the opponent with a swarm of aggressive creatures, powered by cards like Lord of the Accursed and Liliana's Mastery. The deck also includes powerful removal spells like Grasp of Darkness, Fatal Push, and Anguished Unmaking to control the board and keep the pressure on the opponent. The inclusion of Wayward Servant and Shambling Vent provide lifelink to sustain through aggressive strategies, while cards like Cryptbreaker and Diregraf Colossus help maintain card advantage and create a steady flow of threats.

This deck focuses on utilizing aggressive creatures and removal spells to apply pressure on the opponent while maintaining control of the board. The combination of efficient creatures like Glory-Bound Initiate and Spell Queller, along with disruption spells like Stasis Snare and Declaration in Stone, allows the deck to quickly overwhelm the opponent while also dealing with threats. The deck also includes counterspells like Metallic Rebuke and Censor to protect its key cards and maintain tempo. Additionally, cards like Gideon, Ally of Zendikar and Archangel Avacyn provide additional threats and value.

This Boros Aggro deck focuses on playing aggressive creatures and utilizing cards like Thalia's Lieutenant and Honored Crop-Captain to pump up the team. Glory-Bound Initiate provides a powerful threat that can gain lifelink, while Glorybringer offers removal and a strong flying attacker. Always Watching boosts all creatures and grants vigilance, ensuring maximum damage output each turn. The inclusion of burn spells like Incendiary Flow helps deal with opposing threats. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent quickly and efficiently with a combination of creatures and burn spells.

The main idea of this Izzet Control deck is to maintain board control and disrupt the opponent's game plan through counterspells, removal spells, and card advantage. By combining counterspells like Negate and Disallow with removal spells like Magma Spray and Sweltering Suns, this deck aims to control the pace of the game and outvalue the opponent with cards like Glimmer of Genius and Pull from Tomorrow. Additionally, cards like Torrential Gearhulk provide a powerful late-game threat while also allowing for additional value by recasting instants.

This deck focuses on aggressive creatures and vehicles to quickly overwhelm the opponent. By utilizing efficient cards like Toolcraft Exemplar and Gideon, Ally of Zendikar, the deck aims to establish a strong board presence early on. The inclusion of removal spells like Unlicensed Disintegration and Fatal Push helps to clear the way for your creatures to attack. The use of vehicles such as Heart of Kiran and Aethersphere Harvester provide additional threats and evasion. Overall, the strategy revolves around fast and efficient creature attacks combined with powerful planeswalker support.

The main concept of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures like Toolcraft Exemplar, Scrapheap Scrounger, and Gideon, Ally of Zendikar while using efficient removal spells like Fatal Push and Unlicensed Disintegration to clear the way. The deck also utilizes vehicles like Heart of Kiran and Aethersphere Harvester for additional pressure. The mana base is carefully constructed to ensure consistent access to all three colors of mana required for the deck. Overall, the deck aims to quickly put pressure on the opponent and maintain board control throughout the game.

The deck focuses on using Aetherworks Marvel to cheat out powerful cards like Ulamog, the Ceaseless Hunger onto the battlefield early. Utilizing energy generation from cards like Woodweaver's Puzzleknot and Servant of the Conduit, the deck aims to ramp up quickly and overwhelm opponents with massive threats. Whirler Virtuoso and Rogue Refiner provide additional energy generation and card advantage, while Harnessed Lightning offers removal and protection. Chandra, Flamecaller serves as a versatile threat and board wipe option. The deck's strategy revolves around efficiently utilizing energy resources to power out game-ending threats.

The deck focuses on ramping up energy with cards like Attune with Aether and Rogue Refiner to power out Aetherworks Marvel. By using Marvel to cheat out powerful threats like Ulamog, the Ceaseless Hunger and Torrential Gearhulk, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with big plays and card advantage. The deck also includes interaction like Negate and Harnessed Lightning to protect the combo and deal with opposing threats. The goal is to generate a powerful board state and quickly close out the game before the opponent can respond effectively.

This deck focuses on quick, aggressive plays using efficient energy-generating spells like Attune with Aether and Servant of the Conduit to power out powerful creatures like Glorybringer and Elder Deep-Fiend. The deck also includes removal spells like Magma Spray and Harnessed Lightning to deal with opposing threats. With the ability to generate a large amount of energy and play big creatures early, this deck aims to overwhelm opponents with a fast and explosive offense while maintaining some control over the battlefield. The combination of efficient creatures and removal spells makes this deck a powerful force in the Standard 1 vs 1 format.
